list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a point at which parts of an artificial structure are joined.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: seal the joint between the roof and the house wall
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Niêm phong khớp giữa mái nhà và tường nhà

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a structure in the human or animal body at which two parts of the skeleton are fitted together.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: she suffers from stiff joints and finds bending difficult
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: cô ấy bị các khớp cứng và thấy uốn cong khó khăn

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: an establishment of a specified kind, especially one where people meet for eating, drinking, or entertainment.
shared, held, or made by two or more people, parties, or organizations together.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the companies issued a joint statement
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Các công ty đã đưa ra một tuyên bố chung

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: cut (the body of an animal) into joints.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: use a sharp knife to joint the bird
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Sử dụng một con dao sắc để khớp chim
